name: Captain Downes and the Pirate Princess
name_original: Captain Downes and the Pirate Princess
description:
Captain Roderick Downes is sailing the Baltic sea when he is boarded by pirates led by a local princess, and Roderick soon finds himself prisoner on his own ship. Can you help him escape?
Captain Downes and the Pirate Princess is a short point and click adventure made for MAGS October 2018.
